column4: Can someone help me? I've got the ISO onto a CD, but I haven't got further from there :(
#1 - what did youy use to burn the iso to a cd.
Check the Cd.. see what files are on it.. if theres a single whatever.iso  -> you did it wrong.
WHAT program did you use to burn the iso to cd? I reccomend you use 'burn at once' (free for windows)
